field.label: Icon
field.description: If you want to show icon instead of payment method title on registration form, upload it to media/com_eventbooking/assets/images/paymentmethods folder and select the icon here, for example os_paypal.png.

field.label: If you have business PayPal account and want to be able to refund registrant directly from Registrants Management, get API parameters from your PayPal account and enter into below parameters
